    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Napoleons Ansprache vor Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="en">Napoleon speech before Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discours de Napoleon avant Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso de Napoleon antes de Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Discorso di Napoleon prima di Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία Napoleon πριν από Austerlitz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discurso de Napoleon antes de Austerlitz</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsaufträge für Gruppen- und Einzelarbeit zu einer Ansprache Napoleons zur Grande Armee am Vorabend der Schlacht von Austerlitz, am 01.12.1805 (in deutsche Übersetzung).</string>
            <string language="en">Assignments for group and individual work on Napoleon speaking to the Grande Armee the night before the Battle of Austerlitz, December 1, 1805 (translated into German).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Napoleon I.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Napoleon Ith</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affectations pour le groupe et le travail 
individuel sur Napoleon parlant au Grande Armee la nuit avant la 
bataille d'Austerlitz, 1 décembre 1805 (traduit en Allemand).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atribuições para o grupo e o trabalho 
individual em Napoleon que fala ao Grande Armee a noite antes da 
batalha de Austerlitz, dezembro 1, 1805 (traduzido no alemão).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assegnazioni per il gruppo ed il lavoro specifico
su Napoleon che parla al Grande Armee la notte prima della battaglia 
di Austerlitz, 1 dicembre 1805 (tradotto in tedesco).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναθέσεις για την ομάδα και τη μεμονωμένη εργασία για 
Napoleon που μιλά στο Grande Armee η νύχτα πριν από τη 
μάχη Austerlitz, 1 Δεκεμβρίου ..1805 (μεταφρασμένος στα 
γερμανικά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asignaciones para el grupo y el trabajo 
individual sobre Napoleon que habla al Grande Armee la noche antes de 
la batalla de Austerlitz, 1 de diciembre de 1805 (traducido a 
alemán).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napoleon Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napoleon Ith</string>
          </keyword>
